Class Validation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Validation

  • public class Validation
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the validation class that is linked with the main class or the validateApp class. This class has no main method and does not interacter with the user. In other words, this is the supplier class. This class returns two boolean data types zip and ssn.Both methods make use of the maches method from the regex class.
    Version:
    (CSC142 01/29/18)
    Author:
    (Kemba Konteh)

    • Method Detail

      • validateSSN

        public static boolean validateSSN(java.lang.String ssn)
        This is the method that validates the SSN.
        Parameters:
        ssn - is passed in as the only papameter. Returns argument to the calling program.
        Returns:
        ssn.matches("[0-9][0-9][0-9]-[0-9][0-9]-[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]") is returned. Anything outside range will be false.

      • validateZip

        public static boolean validateZip(java.lang.String zip)
        This is the method that validates the zipcode.
        Parameters:
        zip - is passed in as the only parameter. Returns argument to the calling program.
        Returns:
        zip.matches("[0-9]+") && zip.length()==5 is being returned. Entries outside of this range will be false.
